siteMetadata.subtitle: Computer Programmer living in Omaha, NE
siteMetadata.title: Blog by Matt Payne

markdownRemark.html:
This is an amazing and powerful story by Paulette Perhach. Please read the whole thing. It inspires me.

“Wait. This story sucks. If it were one of those Choose Your Own Adventures, here’s where you’d want to flip back, start over, rewrite what happens to you.”

I think it is important to talk with each other about money.

Story posted at Huffington Post

frontmatter.description: Everyone should have a F-Off fund!
frontmatter.title: I wish everyone had this fund
